column4: hello..? how do i install a package from a specific url? "sudo pecl install imagick" installs 2.3.x but i wanna install 2.2 from http://pecl.php.net/get/imagick-2.2.2.tgz is it possible? :(
just downlad the package with wget, extract it, look for a readme to install
with ssh (putty) you have full system-features like your a sitting infront of the pc
but why need an old version? using apt-get is much better (and safer because of updates)
because i am getting an error "make not found
why need make if you install with apt-get?
